title: Add donate text with Cash App handle in footer

requirements.text: Add a visible donation line to the site UI that includes the exact Cash App handle “$WOTWM”. Place it in the global footer (`frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx`) beneath the existing YouTube subscription line, using clear English wording (e.g., “Donate: Cash App $WOTWM”).

quotes: and make a donate text with cash app user $WOTWM

acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a donation line on all pages/sections where the footer is shown.
The donation line includes the exact text “$WOTWM” (including the leading $).
The footer layout remains readable and centered on both mobile and desktop (no overflow or broken spacing).

constraints: Do not edit files in `frontend/src/hooks/*` listed as immutable system paths.
Keep changes within the existing React + Tailwind + shadcn UI patterns already used in the project.
nonGoals: Implementing payment processing, checkout flows, or backend donation tracking.
Adding third-party payment integrations or account linking.
